org.haderlie.claire.dndapp

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.haderlie.claire.dndapp.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A User class for holding the user information This class is used to store the user's data from the database and interact with its list of characters.
    Version:
    3.14159
    Author:
    Niclairex

      • addCharacter

      • editCharacter

        public void editCharacter(int index,
                          org.haderlie.claire.dndapp.Character editedCharacter)
        Edit a character in the characters ArrayList

        It is a "pseudo" edit. The Character itself is not changed, but instead the Character at the given index is replaced with an edited version of itself.

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the Character that is to be replaced.
        editedCharacter - A new Character that was copied from a Character and changed.
